body_html:
@Tvde1 Is this still an issue? Can you please post your observations after trying installation guide given in the comment below.

Ok, I figured it out. See #22715 if interested. Compute >= 5.3 requires patching right now. Followed this guide to patch it. I also did checkout v1.11 as per that guide, not sure if that's required.

body:
@Tvde1  Is this still an issue? Can you please post your observations after trying installation guide given in the comment below.

> Ok, I figured it out. See #22715 if interested. Compute >= 5.3 requires patching right now. Followed [this guide to patch it](https://medium.com/@amsokol.com/update-1-how-to-build-and-install-tensorflow-gpu-cpu-for-windows-from-source-code-using-bazel-and-c2e86fec9ef2). I also did `checkout` v1.11 as per that guide, not sure if that's required.
